attributes.action: request that Leicestershire Social Services fulfil their statutory obligation to investigate the circumstances which led to 3 year old Madeleine McCann being abducted.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
